CustomField.formula: IF( OR( AND(TEXT(OrderApi__Sales_Order__r.OrderApi__Posting_Entity__c) = 'Invoice', OrderApi__Sales_Order__r.OrderApi__Is_Closed__c = true, OrderApi__Sales_Order__r.OrderApi__Is_Posted__c = true), AND(TEXT(OrderApi__Sales_Order__r.OrderApi__Posting_Entity__c) = 'Receipt', OrderApi__Sales_Order__r.OrderApi__Sales_Order_Status__c = 'Paid')), true, false )
CustomField.label: Is Processed
